data.title: Venice Film Festival 2012
data.meta_description: Stars descend on the Italian city for the 69th annual festival
data.text:
Philip Seymour Hoffman of "The Master" with the Coppa Volpi Award for Best Actor, which he shared with co-star Joaquin Phoenix, at the 69th Venice Film Festival, at the Palazzo del Cinema, Sept. 8, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Actress Hadas Yaron poses with her Coppa Volpi for Best Actress for "Lemale Et Ha'Chalal" at the Award Winners Photocall during The 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on September 8, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Director Kim Ki-Duk poses with the Golden Lion for Best Film "Pieta" at the Award Winners Photocall during The 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on September 8, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Austrian film director Ulrich Seidl holds the Special Jury Prize he received for "Paradies: Glaube" during the award ceremony of the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 8, 2012 at Venice Lido.

Director Brian De Palma and actress Noomi Rapace aarrive for the premiere of the film "Passion" at the 69th edition of the Venice Film Festival in Venice, Italy, Sept. 7, 2012.

Actress Noomi Rapace arrives for the premiere of the film "Passion" at the 69th edition of the Venice Film Festival in Venice, Italy, Sept. 7, 2012.

Actress Selena Gomez attends the "Spring Breakers" premiere during The 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Sept. 5, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Vanessa Hudgens attends the "Spring Breakers" premiere during The 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Sept. 5, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left, actors James Franco, Rachel Korine, Ashley Benson, Vanessa Hudgens and Selena Gomez attend the "Spring Breakers" premiere during The 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Sept. 5, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

British actor Clive Owen and Indian actress Freida Pinto pose during a Jaeger-Lecoultre event at the 69th Venice Film Festival on Sept. 4, 2012 ,at the Ca Gustinian palazzo in Venice.

From left, actors Michael Lonsdale, Claudia Cardinale, Luis Miguel Cintra attend the "O Gebo E A Sombra" premiere during The 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Sept. 5, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Pierce Brosnan attends the "Love Is All You Need" Premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on September 2, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Olga Sorokina attends the "To the Wonder" Premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on September 2, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

American actor Frank Grillo poses during the photocall of "Disconnect" at the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 3, 2012 at Venice Lido. "Disconnect" is presented out of competition.

Ukrainian-born actress Olga Kurylenko poses during the photocall of "To the Wonder" during the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 2, 2012 at Venice Lido. "To the Wonder," directe dby Terrence Malick, is competing for the Golden Lion in the Venezia 69 section of the festival.

Italian actress Romina Mondello poses during the photocall of "To the Wonder" during the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 2, 2012 at Venice Lido. The romantic drama - the latest film by U.S. director Terrence Malick - is competing for the Golden Lion in the Venezia 69 section of the festival.

From left: Producer Nicolas Gonda, actresses Olga Kurylenko and Romina Mondello, and producer Sarah Green attend the "To the Wonder" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on September 2, 2012 in Venice, Italy. The romantic drama - the latest film by U.S. director Terrence Malick - is competing for the Golden Lion in the Venezia 69 section of the festival.

From left: Actor Joaquin Phoenix, producer Daniel Lupi, producer JoAnne Sellar, actor Philip Seymour Hoffman and director/writer Paul Thomas Anderson attend "The Master" photocall during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Casino on September 1, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

American actor Philip Seymour Hoffman poses during the photocall of "The Master" during the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 1 , 2012 at Venice Lido. "The Master" is competing for the Golden Lion in the Venezia 69 section of the festival.

Actor Joaquin Phoenix poses during the photocall of "The Master" during the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 1 , 2012 at Venice Lido. "The Master" is competing for the Golden Lion in the Venezia 69 section of the festival.

Australian film director Kimble Rendall wears 3D glasses as he poses during the photocall of the horror film "Bait 3D," being presented out of competition during the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 1 , 2012 at Venice Lido. The film's star, a shark, did not attend.

Actress Kristin Scott Thomas attends the "Cherchez Hortense" photocall during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Casino on September 1, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Actor Willem Dafoe with his wife Giada Colagrande are seen on the red carpet at the 69th Venice Film Festival on September 1, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Director Spike Lee (right) and, from left, his daughter Satchel Lee, son Jackson Lee and wife Tonya Lewis attend the "Bad 25" and Jaeger-Le Coultre - Glory To The Filmmaker 2012 Award ceremony during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on August 31, 2012 in Venice, Italy. Lee has directed a new documentary, "Bad 25," about Michael Jackson's "Bad: album, which was released 25 years ago this week.

Director Spike Lee poses on stage to receive his Jaeger Le Coultre "Glory To The Filmmaker" Award during the 69th Venice Film Festival on August 31, 2012 in Venice, Italy.

Actor Zac Efron and actress Maika Monroe attend the "At Any Price" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Zac Efron and actress Maika Monroe attend the "At Any Price" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, director Ramin Bahrani, actor Zac Efron and actress Maika Monroe attend the "At Any Price" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Zac Efron and actress Maika Monroe attend the "At Any Price" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Zac Efron poses during the photocall of "At Any Price" during the 69th Venice Film Festival on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, screenwriter Hallie Elizabeth Newton with director Ramin Bahrani and actors Zac Efron and Maika Monroe attend the "At Any Price" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Zac Efron and actress Maika Monroe attend the "At Any Price" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Director Spike Lee attends the "Bad" And Jaeger-Le Coultre - Glory To The Filmmaker 2012 Award photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Director Spike Lee and son Jackson Lee attend the "Bad" And Jaeger-Le Coultre - Glory To The Filmmaker 2012 Award photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 31, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Michael Shannon attends "The Iceman" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Winona Ryder attends "The Iceman" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, actor Ray Liotta, actress Winona Ryder, director Ariel Vromen and actor Michael Shannon attend "The Iceman" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, actor Michael Shannon, director Ariel Vromen, actress Winona Ryder and actor Ray Liotta attend "The Iceman" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, actor Michael Shannon, actress Winona Ryder and actor Ray Liotta attend "The Iceman" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, producer Ehud Bleiberg, director Ariel Vromen, actor Michael Shannon, actress Winona Ryder and actor Ray Liotta attend "The Iceman" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, actor Michael Shannon, actress Winona Ryder and actor Ray Liotta attend "The Iceman" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Cecile De France and actor Kad Merad attend the "Superstar" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Cecile De France and actor Kad Merad attends the "Superstar" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, actor Kad Merad, actress Cecile De France and director Xavier Giannoli attend the "Superstar" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Eleonora Carisi attends the "Superstar" premiere during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Winona Ryder attends "The Iceman" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Winona Ryder and actor Ray Liotta attend "The Iceman" photocall during the 69th Venice Film Festival at the Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 30, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actors Naomi Watts and Liev Schreiber attend "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Jury member Laetitia Casta attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Kasia Smutniak attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Kate Hudson attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Jury member Laetitia Casta attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Kate Hudson and Matt Bellamy attend "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actors Naomi Watts and Liev Schreiber attend “The Reluctant Fundamentalist” premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Kasia Smutniak attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" premiere and opening ceremony during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Cinema on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Kate Hudson attends the 69th Venice International Film Festival wearing a Gucci suit on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, writer Mohsin Hamid, actor Riz Ahmed, director Mira Nair, actress Kate Hudson and actor Liev Schreiber of "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" pose upon arrival for the 69th Venice Film Festival on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Kate Hudson, director Mira Nair and actor Liev Schreiber attend the 69th Venice International Film Festival on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actress Kate Hudson attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" photocall during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

Actor Liev Schreiber attends "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" photocall during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.

From left to right, actress Kate Hudson, actor Riz Ahmed, director Mira Nair and actor Liev Schreiber attend "The Reluctant Fundamentalist" Photocall during the 69th Venice International Film Festival at Palazzo del Casino on Aug. 29, 2012, in Venice, Italy.
